network_overview: 11-minute LTE lab capture shows only control-plane keep-alive: S1-AP heart-beats, GTP-C echo, and internal DNS bursts; zero user-plane GTP-U tunnels and 100 % Diameter “2001” errors indicate every attempted subscriber session was rejected by HSS/AAA.

observations.finding: All 64 Diameter transactions (Cmd-318/316/324) return Result-Code 2001 (DIAMETER_ERROR_USER_UNKNOWN) – every attach/PDN request is denied.
No GTP-U tunnels created (0 TEIDs) – user-plane is completely idle; only GTP-C echo on S5/S8.
Zero SIP/RTP/VoLTE flows; IMS signalling absent.

root_causes.description: Diameter Cx/S6a commands carry IMSI from MME but HSS answers 2001 for every request, so UE context is never created and S1-AP stays in procedure 11/13 loop without moving to initial-context-setup.
root_causes.impact: Complete service outage – no EPS bearer, no data, no voice.

recommendations.action: Check HSS subscriber data for MCC-MNC 427-01 – ensure test SIMs are provisioned and not barred.
recommendations.rationale: Eliminates the 2001 USER_UNKNOWN rejects and allows normal attach.

recommendations.action: Verify MME configuration: realm ‘epc.mnc001.mcc427.3gppnetwork.org’ must match HSS realm and peer entry.
recommendations.rationale: Realm mismatch can cause HSS to treat requests as roaming and reject.

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U capture on S1-U/S5 to confirm bearer creation once HSS issue is cleared.
recommendations.rationale: Validates end-to-end user-plane after control-plane fix.

session_analysis.signaling_health: S1-AP SCTP association stable (27 pkts, 11 min) but every UE context attempt stalls at Procedure-11 (UE-capability) because HSS denies authentication.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U tunnels; PGW never receives Create-Session-Request, so data path is down.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No IMS signalling detected; VoLTE impossible without EPS bearer.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Diameter failure blocks bearer creation → no GTP-U → no SIP/RTP; fixing HSS reject will unblock entire chain.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant eNB
    participant MME
    participant HSS
    UE->>eNB: RRC Connection Request
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Procedure-11 (Initial UE msg)
    MME->>HSS: Diameter Cmd-318 (Update-Location)
    HSS->>MME: Diameter 2001 User-Unknown
    MME->>eNB: S1-AP Procedure-13 (Reject)
    eNB->>UE: RRC Connection Release
    Note over UE,HSS: Loop repeats every ~10 s – no service
